org.incendo.events

Class SimpleEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.incendo.events.EventBus
      • org.incendo.events.SimpleEventBus

  • public final class SimpleEventBus
extends EventBus
    Simple EventBus implementation using a cached thread pool to handle asynchronous events Event bus responsible for distributing submitted events, and handling Listener registrations
